gameResults.title: Enter Game Results
gameResults.noResultsMessageEditable: No results have been entered for this game yet. You can enter the results once the game has started.
gameResults.noResultsMessageReadOnly: No results have been entered for this game yet.
gameResults.deleteRoundConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this round? This action cannot be undone.
gameResults.sendToTelegramFailed: Failed to send results to Telegram
gameResults.editTelegramTextDescription: Review and edit the text before sending to Telegram
gameResults.restartConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to restart this game? All results will be cleared from the database and local storage.
gameResults.finishConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to finish and save the results? This will save all entered results to the database.
gameResults.editConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to edit the results? This will undo all outcomes and revoke the results. All rating changes will be reversed.
gameResults.matchGenerationTypeHandmadeNote: You must set all players in teams yourself. The most flexible option.
gameResults.matchGenerationTypeFixedNote: After you set the first round, other rounds will be a copy of the first.
gameResults.matchGenerationTypeRandomNote: Americano format - everyone will be randomly assigned and we will avoid putting the same players in one team twice as much as possible.
gameResults.matchGenerationTypeRoundRobinNote: Coming Soon - Round-robin format - everyone must play against everyone.
gameResults.matchGenerationTypeRatingNote: Mexicano format - First round is random. From second round onwards, matches are based on current standings: 1&3 vs 2&4, 5&7 vs 6&8, etc. Players can face each other multiple times.
gameResults.matchGenerationTypeWinnersCourtNote: Winners Court format - players sorted by level initially (1&3 vs 2&4 on top court). Winners move up a court and switch partners, losers move down and switch partners. On the winners court, winners stay but split up and play with challengers from the court below.
gameResults.ballsInGamesNoteOn: You can track games within sets like classic tennis (0-15-30-40-game), but it's optional - you can still just count balls.
gameResults.ballsInGamesNoteOff: Games are disabled. Only the set result counts.
gameResults.doesNotAffectRating: This game does not affect ratings
gameResults.ratingExplanation: Your rating changes based on match results, opponent strength, and score differences. Close matches (small point differential) have less impact (30-100%), while decisive wins have greater impact (100-300%). Winning against stronger opponents gives you more points, while losing to weaker opponents costs more. In draws, higher-rated players lose level and lower-rated players gain level, proportional to the level difference.
gameResults.socialLevelExplanation: Your social level increases based on playing with different participants. You get a boost for each participant you play with (0.06 for new connections, decreasing to 0.01 after 10+ games together). Owners and admins receive multipliers (1.5x for owners who played, 0.5x if they didn't play).
gameResults.unsyncedChangesMessage: You have local changes that are not synced to the server. Before updating the local database, please choose an action:
gameResults.eraseAndLoadFromServer: Erase Local Changes & Load from Server
gameResults.resetConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all game results? This action cannot be undone.

createGame.title: Create Game
createGame.gameTypeNote: You can change detailed game settings in the Game Setup section.
createGame.gameTypeNoteLeague: You can change detailed league settings in the League Setup section.

note.true: Any participant can invite other players.

noteTraining.true: Any participant can invite other participants.

note.false: Will be private and only visible to invited participants.
note.true: Will be visible to all players and can be found in the search.

noteTraining.false: Will be private and only visible to invited participants.
noteTraining.true: Will be visible to all players and can be found in the search.

note.false: Only organizers can enter and modify results.
note.true: Any participant can enter and modify results.

note.false: Players need approval from organizers before joining.
note.true: Players can join directly without waiting for approval.

noteTraining.false: Participants need approval from organizers before joining.
noteTraining.true: Participants can join directly without waiting for approval.

afterGameGoToBar.title: Stay at the bar after the game
afterGameGoToBar.titleTraining: Stay at the bar after the training

note.false: Does not include a social gathering after the match.
note.true: Includes a social gathering after the match.

noteTraining.false: Does not include a social gathering after the training.
noteTraining.true: Includes a social gathering after the training.

note.false: Scoreboard is individual. Players will play with anyone based on rules.
note.true: Scoreboard is team-based. You can fix players in teams that will compete against each other. Team players cannot be replaced after it starts.

note.false: Results will not affect participants' levels.

note.mixPairs: Only for team playing, each team will consist of 1 man, 1 woman, equal number of man/woman will be allowed to join.

gameDetails.notPlayingHint: You are not playing, but you are still a participant in the chat. You can leave the chat instead.
gameDetails.notPlayingHintGame:
• You are a participant in the chat.
• You can rejoin the game, but you can't be invited again until you leave the chat too.
• If you leave the chat, the game will be removed from 'my games' section and you will need an invitation or wait in queue to rejoin the game.
gameDetails.notPlayingHintTournament:
• You are a participant in the chat.
• You can rejoin the tournament, but you can't be invited again until you leave the chat too.
• If you leave the chat, the tournament will be removed from 'my games' section and you will need an invitation or wait in queue to rejoin the tournament.
